name: Anatolii saves new year (Vlad_svarchik)
description:
What would happen if the new year was ruined, not because of some evil (the Grinch or Krampus), but because of your stupidity? Yes. The stupidity itself was not special, but at the same time almost disastrous. That's what happens when you cut down a tree where it's forbidden. But with your help, the protagonist Anatoly can save this new year. Or will he not?

Game Features:

-Multiple endings, depending on your actions

-Strange plot, which even by degrees you will not particularly understand

The game has support for gamepads (including unofficial ones)

The game contains crude language, references to alcoholic beverages, rude jokes, violence and moderate profanity.
